request.description:
Response example:

\[ "Schedule Conflict", "Moved Away", "Lost Interest", "Health Reasons", "Disciplinary Action", "Other"\]

query.description: Search string to match against name fields
Page number (1-based). Defaults to 1 if not specified.
Number of records per page. Defaults to 8 if not specified. Maximum is 100.

request.description:
Get contacts matching a search string using Salesforce Object Search Language (SOSL). This endpoint provides better text search performance and more flexible matching compared to the regular search endpoint.

Response includes pagination information:
```json
{
  "contacts": [...],
  "totalPages": 5,
  "currentPage": 1,
  "pageSize": 8,
  "totalRecords": 40
}
```
